member.name: ACL_SIZE_INFORMATION
member.summary: The ACL_SIZE_INFORMATION structure contains information about the size of an structure.

member.name: ACL_SIZE_INFORMATION.AceCount
member.summary: The number of access control entries (ACEs) in the access control list (ACL).

member.name: ACL_SIZE_INFORMATION.AclBytesInUse
member.summary: The number of bytes in the ACL actually used to store the ACEs and structure. This may be less than the total number of bytes allocated to the ACL.

member.name: ACL_SIZE_INFORMATION.AclBytesFree
member.summary: The number of unused bytes in the ACL.
